name: Magic Meisters - An Open World Co-oP Multiplayer RPG
blurb: Magic Meisters is an open world RPG filled with mystical creatures, magic, dungeons, and multiplayer adventuring for all ages!

rewards.reward: THE SUPPORT ==============================  Receive an exclusive supporter wallpaper for your phone and desktop from Magic Meisters and early access to the Magic Meisters forum and your name in the credits as a backer!

THE DIGITAL EARLY BIRD ! ==============================  Receive a Digital Copy of the Magic Meisters game as well as the  exclusive wallpaper for your portable and desktop devices when the campaign completes ! All Backers at this level or higher will receive Closed Beta Access as well. Exclusive KS pricing!

THE FRIEND ! ==============================  Receive an extra copy of the Magic Meisters game for a friend, this includes forum access and early beta access for both of you. Exclusive KS pricing ! + Includes all previous rewards

THE DETAILS ==============================  Receive a Magic Meisters Poster ( Shipping included ), Early Nickname Registration to Magic Meisters,  and the Magic Meisters Soundtrack ! + Includes all previous rewards

THE BOXER ==============================  Receive an exclusive BOXED EDITION of Magic Meisters which includes : Box Artwork, Disc of the game, Your 2 passkeys for early registrations for you and a friend, also included is a large 3D printed Dungeon Key. Also included is a Digital eBook of the Art of Magic Meisters + Includes all previous rewards

THE COLLECTOR ==============================  Your boxed edition of Magic Meisters now INCLUDES: A 3D printed Large Treasure Chest + 3 large dungeon keys and a 3D print of the Statue of Terra  that are copied directly from our in-game models for your desk! Also included is a postcard with a sketch signed by our team artist! Swag!  You will also get a personal shout out in our end video of the KS campaign and in our forums which will now include your very own custom title! + Includes all previous rewards

THE IMAGE ==============================  Have your likeness immortalized in-game as a villager with custom first and last name included. First 10 to grab the package have their custom NPC as questgivers! Receive a 3D print of the NPC unit ! Also included in this bundle is the PRINTED Artbook + Includes all previous rewards

THE TRENDSETTER ==============================  Work with the team artist for a day to create an outfit ( Head, Body,Gloves, Feet ) and a custom Magic Staff to be included in the Magic Meisters game. Each clothing piece will be accessible by your character as soon as you start the game ! Receive the exclusive ORIGINAL ART sketch of your outfit signed by our artist and a 3D print of the entire figure in one of a variety of poses! + Includes all previous rewards

THE IMMORTAL ==============================  A Statue of your character is placed into the main capital of Terra with a legendary back story that is prominent in-game with a quest line! Also included is the creation of a unique spell in-game for one of our element branches created and named by you ! Including a Sponsorship credit in the game! + Includes all previous rewards )

THE ELITE ==============================  Working with the artist create a piece of concept art for a new enemy, we then take that creature idea and model it in-game as an elite creature that will be tough to beat! A 3D figure of the creature will be included with an artprint signed by the artist for your desk! + Includes all previous rewards

THE PRODUCER PACKAGE ==============================  Receive 8 BOXED copies of Magic Meisters including 8 Pre-Registrations, all the 3D printed Keys/Chests, Posters, and artist autographs. 3D Figures of creatures/meisters will be included and signed and will be featured on our website. Included in this bundle deal is special access to the private team forum, exclusive news postings and a special VIP Launch day Party with you being a guest of honor in Toronto, Canada during FanExpo 2014 ! ( Transportation Not Included ) If you can not attend, we will host an on-line session event with you and QFI team !\r\n+ Includes all previous rewards

THE TITAN ==============================  The Elemental Titan's are the MOST POWERFUL enemies in the game and you will work with the team to create a quest chain and Titan that will be a significant part of a story line and the world of Terra ! The Titan Reward includes a full 3d figure of your Titan creature over 6" Tall with a mini Meister figure and a custom wallpaper for the game created with both your Meister and Titan and the original artwork sent to you! Included in this bundle deal is special access to team discussions , exclusive news posting and a special VIP Launch day Party with you being a guest of honor in Toronto, Canada during Fanexpo 2014 and an Executive Producer credit ! ( Transportation Not Included )  If you can not attend, we will host an on-line session event with you and QFI team ! - + Includes all previous rewards

THE RACE ==============================  Work with the team to create an entire new race option available ingame and an area of the world based on your design and style including creature sets, clothing and weapon sets, and theme. 3d Print models will be made of all 5 custom creatures, 1 Meister, 1 Titan, 10 Items and 1 unique Treasure Chest. A rare opportunity to get your vision in this mystical world made reality! Included in this bundle deal is special access to team discussions , exclusive news posting and a special VIP Launch day Party with you being a guest of honor in Toronto, Canada during Fanexpo 2014 and Lead Producer Credit as well as saved space in the credit for any Logo/Picture you would like ! ( Transportation Not Included ) If you can not attend, we will host an on-line session event with you and QFI team !+ Includes all previous rewards
